originalText.text: The best dentist in NYC! I started seeing Dr. Chen this past year after seeing the amazing work she provided my friend. Making my first appointment was the best decision I’ve ever made. Dr. Chen and her team are extremely professional, friendly, and truly care about your dental health and provided cosmetic options that I was looking for. My first visit included a full assessment (using state of the art technology) with a clear action plan to achieve my overall dental objectives. If you want a real dental professional that provides real results (and not just your normal teeth cleanings, which was the case with my previous dentist), then go see Dr. Chen. On top of all this, her new office is absolutely beautiful and conveniently located in midtown. Thank you Dr. Chen and team! So glad I found you!

originalText.text:
I have been a patient at Dr. Chen's for about 5 years now and cannot recommend her and her office enough!

Dr. Chen has always been very professional and a pleasure to see. I really appreciate how realistic she is in her practice. I have had to tackle some dental issues, ultimately getting Invisalign to correct my bite. When the issue first came up I let Dr. Chen know that I wasn't necessarily in the financial position to do that right away and she was very helpful and never pushed any product/procedures. We were able to do some short term fixes until I was able to afford the full cost (which they have helpful payment plans for!) Overall I've had really wonderful experiences with her.

Shout out to Lindsey who runs the front desk as well! She's so kind and super helpful, especially when it comes to scheduling/dealing with insurance questions/finding times that work around your schedule.

If you're looking for a dentist go see Dr. Chen! Office is conveniently around Grand Central. I still make the trip from Brooklyn even though I no longer work in the area! Definitely SUPER convenient if you do work in Midtown.

originalText.text: I have never met a dentist quite like Dr. Chen. She is friendly, patient, kind, knowledgeable, responsive, and experienced (to say the least). She has been my dentist for almost four years now and am very pleased. Lindsay, her assistant, always greets you with a smile and is super friendly. Dr. Chen and her amazing staff are simply the best!!

originalText.text: A friend recommended Dr. Chen 3 years ago when I first moved to NYC and I haven't needed to search for a dentist since then. She is an amazing dentist who takes the time to thoroughly explain any procedures or issues you might have during your visit. I would recommend Dr. Chen to anyone looking for a new dentist.

She is an amazing dentist who takes the time to thoroughly explain any procedures or issues you might have during your visit. I would recommend Dr. Chen to anyone looking for a new dentist.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr. Chen! I have been a patient of hers for over five years and she never disappoints. I used to hate going to the dentist, but Dr. Chen and her team make the experience as pleasant as possible. She takes the time to thoroughly answer any questions you have, utilizes the latest technology, provides honest feedback, and never tries to upsell you on services she doesn't think you need.
